The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 15 July is 49,690 (5,751.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 July, there were 2,412 new confirmed cases (279.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 July, there were 1,585 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 52% (827 extra cases).
